Should also add animal cruelty and killing cute adorable animals as a warning. I'd actually like to have one of those pink cat/hamster/rabbit like creatures as a pet.

This porn is actually pretty deep. Basically, MC gets stuck in a utopia where food is always available, the climate is perfect, everybody can fuck whoever they want whenever they want, and there is no conflict or social hierarchy.  He then does everything within his ability to fuck it up.
